adchoices.title: Ad Choices
adchoices.intro: At Netflix, we want to provide you with control over your advertising experience. This page explains your choices regarding interest-based advertising and how to manage your preferences.

choices.title: Interest-Based Advertising
choices.description: We use information about your Netflix viewing history and interactions to show you relevant ads.
options: Learn more about how ads work

choices.title: Cross-Device Advertising
choices.description: We may show you ads across different devices based on your Netflix activity.

choices.title: Third-Party Advertising
choices.description: We work with advertising partners to deliver relevant ads across the web.

industryOptOutTools.title: Industry Opt-Out Tools
industryOptOutTools.description: You can also use these industry-standard tools to manage your advertising preferences across multiple companies:

tools.description: Opt out of interest-based ads from participating companies.

tools.name: Network Advertising Initiative
tools.description: Manage advertising preferences from NAI member companies.

tools.name: Your Online Choices
tools.description: European tool for managing online behavioral advertising.

doNotTrack.title: Do Not Track
doNotTrack.description: Some browsers offer a "Do Not Track" feature that lets you tell websites you don't want your online activity tracked. Netflix currently does not respond to "Do Not Track" signals.

instructions.title: To enable Do Not Track in your browser:
steps: Chrome: Settings ‚Üí Privacy and security ‚Üí Send a "Do Not Track" request
Firefox: Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Send websites a "Do Not Track" signal
Safari: Preferences ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Send Do Not Track requests
Edge: Settings ‚Üí Cookies and site permissions ‚Üí Send "Do Not Track" requests

iosAndroid.title: iOS and Android
iosAndroid.description: You can limit ad tracking on your mobile device through your device settings:

platforms.note: Turn off to limit app tracking.

platforms.name: Android Devices
platforms.instruction: Settings ‚Üí Google ‚Üí Ads ‚Üí Opt out of Ads Personalization
platforms.note: Opt out to limit personalized ads.

contact.title: Questions About Your Choices?
contact.description: If you have questions about your advertising choices or need assistance managing your preferences, please contact us.

adchoices.footer: Your choices may take up to 30 days to take effect. Some advertising may still appear based on contextual information.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Netflix. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

questions.question: How do I sign up for Netflix?
questions.answer: To sign up for Netflix, visit our website and click on the 'Sign Up' button. Choose your plan, enter your email and create a password. You can start watching immediately after signing up.

questions.question: What plans does Netflix offer?
questions.answer: Netflix offers three plans: Basic ($8.99/month), Standard ($13.49/month), and Premium ($17.99/month). Each plan allows streaming on different numbers of devices simultaneously.

questions.question: How do I cancel my Netflix subscription?
questions.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Go to your Account page, click on 'Cancel Membership' under Membership & Billing, and follow the instructions.

questions.question: When will I be charged for my Netflix subscription?
questions.answer: You'll be charged at the beginning of your billing cycle. For new members, this is the date you signed up. You can check your next billing date in your Account settings.

questions.question: How do I update my payment method?
questions.answer: Go to your Account page and click on 'Update payment info' under Membership & Billing. You can add a new payment method or update your existing one.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are not available for Netflix subscriptions. However, you can cancel your membership at any time to stop future charges.

questions.question: How many devices can I watch Netflix on at once?
questions.answer: This depends on your plan: Basic (1 device), Standard (2 devices), Premium (4 devices). You can watch on any supported device with internet.

questions.question: Why is Netflix not working on my device?
questions.answer: Try restarting your device, checking your internet connection, or updating the Netflix app. If issues persist, visit our Help Center for device-specific troubleshooting.

questions.question: Can I download content to watch offline?
questions.answer: Yes, you can download select TV shows and movies to watch offline on supported devices. Look for the download icon next to the title.

questions.question: How do I create profiles for different family members?
questions.answer: Go to your Account page and click on 'Manage Profiles' under Profile & Parental Controls. You can create up to 5 profiles per account.

questions.question: How do I change my email address?
questions.answer: Visit your Account page and click on 'Change email' under Membership & Billing. You'll need to verify your new email address.

questions.question: Can I share my Netflix account with others?
questions.answer: Netflix accounts are for personal use only. Sharing account details violates our Terms of Use. Each household should have their own account.

questions.question: How does Netflix recommend content?
questions.answer: Our recommendation system uses your viewing history, ratings, and preferences to suggest content you'll enjoy. The more you watch, the better our recommendations become.

questions.question: Why can't I find a specific movie or show?
questions.answer: Content availability varies by region due to licensing agreements. Some titles may not be available in your country, or they may have been removed from our catalog.

questions.question: How do I rate content on Netflix?
questions.answer: You can rate titles by hovering over them and clicking the thumbs up or thumbs down icon. This helps us improve our recommendations for you.

faq.subtitle: Trouvez des r√©ponses aux questions courantes sur Netflix. Vous ne trouvez pas ce que vous cherchez ? Contactez notre √©quipe d'assistance.

questions.a: Pour vous inscrire √† Netflix, visitez notre site Web et cliquez sur le bouton 'S'inscrire'. Choisissez votre forfait, entrez votre e-mail et cr√©ez un mot de passe. Vous pouvez commencer √† regarder imm√©diatement apr√®s vous √™tre inscrit.
Netflix propose trois forfaits : Basique (8,99 $/mois), Standard (13,49 $/mois) et Premium (17,99 $/mois). Chaque forfait permet de diffuser sur un nombre diff√©rent d'appareils simultan√©ment.
Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement √† tout moment. Allez sur votre page Compte, cliquez sur 'Annuler l'abonnement' dans la section Abonnement et facturation, et suivez les instructions.

questions.q: Quand vais-je √™tre factur√© pour mon abonnement Netflix ?
questions.a: Vous serez factur√© au d√©but de votre cycle de facturation. Pour les nouveaux membres, c'est la date √† laquelle vous vous √™tes inscrit. Vous pouvez v√©rifier votre prochaine date de facturation dans les param√®tres de votre compte.

questions.q: Comment puis-je mettre √† jour mon mode de paiement ?
questions.a: Allez sur votre page Compte et cliquez sur 'Mettre √† jour les informations de paiement' dans la section Abonnement et facturation. Vous pouvez ajouter un nouveau mode de paiement ou mettre √† jour votre mode de paiement existant.
Les remboursements ne sont pas disponibles pour les abonnements Netflix. Cependant, vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement √† tout moment pour arr√™ter les frais futurs.

questions.q: Combien d'appareils puis-je regarder Netflix en m√™me temps ?
questions.a: Cela d√©pend de votre forfait : Basique (1 appareil), Standard (2 appareils), Premium (4 appareils). Vous pouvez regarder sur tout appareil compatible avec Internet.

questions.q: Pourquoi Netflix ne fonctionne-t-il pas sur mon appareil ?
questions.a: Essayez de red√©marrer votre appareil, de v√©rifier votre connexion Internet ou de mettre √† jour l'application Netflix. Si les probl√®mes persistent, visitez notre Centre d'aide pour des solutions sp√©cifiques √† votre appareil.

questions.q: Puis-je t√©l√©charger du contenu pour le regarder hors ligne ?
questions.a: Oui, vous pouvez t√©l√©charger certaines √©missions et films pour les regarder hors ligne sur des appareils compatibles. Recherchez l'ic√¥ne de t√©l√©chargement √† c√¥t√© du titre.

questions.q: Comment cr√©er des profils pour les diff√©rents membres de la famille ?

questions.q: Comment puis-je changer mon adresse e-mail ?
questions.a: Visitez votre page Compte et cliquez sur 'Changer d'e-mail' dans la section Abonnement et facturation. Vous devrez v√©rifier votre nouvelle adresse e-mail.

questions.q: Puis-je partager mon compte Netflix avec d'autres personnes ?
questions.a: Les comptes Netflix sont r√©serv√©s √† un usage personnel. Le partage des d√©tails du compte viole nos Conditions d'utilisation. Chaque foyer doit avoir son propre compte.

Notre syst√®me de recommandation utilise votre historique de visionnage, vos √©valuations et vos pr√©f√©rences pour sugg√©rer du contenu que vous pourriez aimer. Plus vous regardez, meilleures sont nos recommandations.

questions.q: Pourquoi ne puis-je pas trouver un film ou une √©mission sp√©cifique ?
questions.a: La disponibilit√© du contenu varie selon les r√©gions en raison des accords de licence. Certains titres peuvent ne pas √™tre disponibles dans votre pays, ou ils peuvent avoir √©t√© retir√©s de notre catalogue.
Vous pouvez √©valuer les titres en les survolant et en cliquant sur l'ic√¥ne du pouce vers le haut ou vers le bas. Cela nous aide √† am√©liorer nos recommandations pour vous.

sections.title: Acceptation des conditions
sections.content: En acc√©dant et en utilisant Netflix, vous acceptez d'√™tre li√© par les termes et dispositions de cet accord. De plus, en utilisant ces services particuliers, vous serez soumis √† toutes les directives ou r√®gles affich√©es applicables √† ces services.

sections.title: Description du service
sections.content: Netflix fournit aux utilisateurs un acc√®s √† une riche collection de ressources en ligne, y compris divers outils de communication, forums, services de shopping, services de recherche et contenu personnalis√©. Sauf indication contraire explicite, toute nouvelle fonctionnalit√© qui augmente ou am√©liore le service actuel sera soumise aux Conditions de service.

sections.title: Comptes utilisateurs
sections.content: Afin d'utiliser certaines fonctionnalit√©s du service, vous devez vous enregistrer pour obtenir un compte. Lorsque vous vous enregistrez, vous acceptez de fournir des informations pr√©cises, actuelles et compl√®tes vous concernant et de mettre √† jour ces informations pour les maintenir pr√©cises, actuelles et compl√®tes.

sections.title: Politique de confidentialit√©
sections.content: Votre vie priv√©e est tr√®s importante pour nous. En cons√©quence, nous avons √©labor√© cette politique afin que vous puissiez comprendre comment nous collectons, utilisons, communiquons et divulguons et utilisons des informations personnelles. Notre politique de confidentialit√© est incorpor√©e dans ces termes par r√©f√©rence.

sections.title: Contenu et comportement
sections.content: Vous comprenez que toutes les informations, donn√©es, textes, logiciels, musiques, sons, photographies, graphiques, vid√©os, messages ou autres mat√©riaux ("Contenu"), qu'ils soient publiquement affich√©s ou transmis en priv√©, sont sous la seule responsabilit√© de la personne dont provient ce Contenu.

Impersonate any person or entity or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity
Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any Content that you do not have a right to transmit under any law or under contractual or fiduciary relationships

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: You agree that Netflix may, under certain circumstances and without prior notice, immediately terminate your account and access to the Service. Cause for such termination shall include, but not be limited to:
list: Breaches or violations of the Terms of Service or other incorporated agreements or guidelines
Requests by law enforcement or other government agencies

hero.title: Ways to Watch
hero.subtitle: Enjoy Netflix on any device, anywhere, anytime. Choose from hundreds of supported devices and platforms.

platforms.name: Web Browsers
platforms.description: Watch on any device with a web browser

platforms.name: Mobile Apps
platforms.description: Download the Netflix app for iOS and Android

platforms.name: Smart TV Apps
platforms.description: Built-in Netflix apps on smart TVs

platforms.name: Gaming Consoles
platforms.description: Netflix on PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo

viewingOptions.title: HD Streaming
viewingOptions.description: Watch in high definition on supported devices

viewingOptions.title: Ultra HD 4K
viewingOptions.description: Experience stunning 4K resolution on compatible TVs

viewingOptions.title: HDR
viewingOptions.description: Enhanced colors and contrast with HDR technology

viewingOptions.title: Offline Downloads
viewingOptions.description: Download shows and movies to watch without internet

viewingOptions.title: Multiple Profiles
viewingOptions.description: Create up to 5 profiles for personalized recommendations

viewingOptions.title: Parental Controls
viewingOptions.description: Set restrictions and monitor viewing activity

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started is Easy
gettingStarted.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start watching Netflix on your favorite device.

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.description: Create your Netflix account or sign in to an existing one.

steps.title: Choose Your Plan
steps.description: Select the plan that best fits your viewing needs.

steps.title: Start Watching
steps.description: Download the app or visit netflix.com and enjoy unlimited entertainment.

questions.question: Can I watch Netflix on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can watch on 1-4 devices simultaneously. You can also download content for offline viewing on up to 100 devices.

questions.question: Do I need a smart TV to watch Netflix?
questions.answer: No, you don't need a smart TV. You can watch on any device with the Netflix app or through a web browser, including gaming consoles, streaming devices, and computers.

questions.question: What's the difference between HD and Ultra HD?
questions.answer: HD (High Definition) offers 1080p resolution, while Ultra HD (4K) provides 2160p resolution for sharper, more detailed picture quality. Ultra HD requires compatible devices and a Premium plan.

cta.title: Ready to Start Watching?
cta.subtitle: Join millions of Netflix members enjoying unlimited entertainment on their favorite devices.

hero.title: Only on Netflix
hero.subtitle: Discover exclusive Netflix Originals, from blockbuster movies to binge-worthy series that you can't find anywhere else.

originals.title: Stranger Things
originals.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

originals.title: The Crown
originals.description: Follow the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

originals.title: Money Heist
originals.description: An unusual group of robbers attempt to carry out the most perfect robbery in Spanish history - stealing 2.4 billion euros from the Royal Mint of Spain.

originals.title: Black Mirror
originals.description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

originals.title: The Witcher
originals.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

originals.title: Bridgerton
originals.description: The story of Daphne Bridgerton, the eldest daughter of the powerful Bridgerton family, as she makes her debut onto Regency London's competitive marriage market.

upcoming.title: One Piece
upcoming.description: Follow Monkey D. Luffy and his Straw Hat Pirates as they explore the Grand Line in search of the legendary treasure One Piece.

upcoming.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
upcoming.description: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous quest to master all four elements and restore balance to the world.

upcoming.title: The Three-Body Problem
upcoming.description: A secret military group recruits scientists to solve a bizarre puzzle only they can decipher, leading to a confrontation with an extraterrestrial civilization.

whyOriginals.title: Exclusive Content
whyOriginals.description: Stories and series you can only find on Netflix, created specifically for our platform.

whyOriginals.title: Global Stories
whyOriginals.description: Diverse narratives from creators around the world, bringing unique perspectives to life.

whyOriginals.title: Binge-Worthy
whyOriginals.description: Multiple episodes released at once, perfect for marathon viewing sessions.

whyOriginals.title: Bold & Creative
whyOriginals.description: Innovative storytelling that pushes boundaries and challenges conventions.

whyOriginals.title: Award-Winning
whyOriginals.description: Critically acclaimed content that has won numerous awards and recognitions.

whyOriginals.title: Anytime, Anywhere
whyOriginals.description: Watch on any device, download for offline viewing, and pick up where you left off.

cta.title: Start Your Netflix Journey
cta.subtitle: Join millions of members enjoying exclusive Netflix Originals and unlimited entertainment.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Netflix, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our streaming service. By using Netflix, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: Account Information: Email address, password, and profile information you provide when creating an account.
Usage Data: Information about how you use Netflix, including viewing history, search queries, and device information.
Payment Information: Billing details and payment method information (processed securely by third-party providers).
Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and device identifiers.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Provide and improve our streaming service
Personalize your viewing experience and recommendations
Process payments and manage your account
Communicate with you about your account and our services
Ensure security and prevent fraud
Comply with legal obligations

sections.title: Information Sharing
content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
We may share information with service providers who help us operate Netflix.
We may disclose information when required by law or to protect our rights.
Aggregated, anonymized data may be shared for research or business purposes.

sections.title: Data Security
content: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data.
We regularly update our security measures to protect against unauthorized access.
We limit access to personal information to authorized employees only.
We conduct regular security audits and assessments.

sections.title: Your Rights
content: Access: You can request a copy of the personal information we have about you.
Correction: You can update your account information at any time.
Deletion: You can request deletion of your account and associated data.
Portability: You can request your data in a portable format.
Opt-out: You can opt out of certain data processing activities.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content.
You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
We may use analytics tools to understand how our service is used.
We do not respond to 'Do Not Track' signals at this time.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
content: Netflix is not intended for children under 13.
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
If we become aware of such collection, we will delete the information immediately.
Parental controls are available to help manage children's viewing.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own.
We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.
Our service is available in many countries worldwide.
Data protection laws may vary by jurisdiction.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
We will notify you of material changes via email or service notifications.
Your continued use of Netflix after changes constitutes acceptance.
The effective date of changes will be posted at the top of this policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

privacyTeam.title: Privacy Team
privacyTeam.address: Address: 100 Winchester Circle, Los Gatos, CA 95032

dataProtectionOfficer.title: Data Protection Officer
dataProtectionOfficer.description: For GDPR and other data protection inquiries:

privacy.footer: This Privacy Policy is subject to our Terms of Use and Cookie Preferences.

hero.title: Netflix Around the World
hero.subtitle: Discover how Netflix operates globally, supporting local creators and bringing diverse stories to audiences everywhere.

locations.description: Our headquarters and creative hub in Hollywood.
